name: WP Auto Hotel Finder
author: Lucia Intelisano

sections.description:
Download zipped documentation here http://goo.gl/lrnb2j

With this plugin, you can show the map with the hotel in all the places you want.
Suppose you have a webcam-containing 2000 items and would like to insert a list of hotels for every place.
No more having to edit each item individually, no fatigue, he’ll find the correct location.
All automatically. For each hotel, also they display details such as stars, address, website.
The list of hotels is ordered from the nearest center of the map to farthest.
It is also possible to place the search form of a place. With each drag the map, everything is recalculated.
sections.installation:
Download zipped documentation here http://goo.gl/lrnb2j
To install and use this plugin, watch the video!

To install the plugin manually:

  1. Extract the contents of the archive (zip file)
  2. Upload the wpautosetfeaturedimageplus folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins section in your WordPress admin panel.

Upload via the WordPress administration panel:

  1. Click on “Plugins” in the left panel, then click on “Add new”.
  2. You should now see the Install Plugins page. Click on “Upload”.
  3. Click on Browse and select your “wp-auto-hotel-finder.zip” file.
  4. Click on “Install now”, activate it and you’re done!
sections.changelog:
2.0

Smart loading of scripts
Button “add hotel map” on editor

short_description: Show a detailed map of hotels with a shortcode or by cat/tag with auto searching for address inside post
